replies.msg:
Nizi Project (ニジプロジェクト) 是JYP Entertainment和Sony Entertainment共同合作的女團計劃。JYP把成員們的個性比喻成不同的顏色，互相疊加，相輔相成，把成員們像「彩虹」一樣擁有耀眼奪目的色彩的存在發掘出來，因此計劃命名為「Nizi Project」。

Nizi Project放送及配信相關:
網上配信: Hulu (2020年1月31日起，每週五，日本時間22:00）
定期特定企劃: 日本電視 スッキリ

最新更新集數:EP.4

官網: https://niziproject.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/niziproject_official_
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nizi_official

Nizi Project相關官方影片
Teaser: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o6-DcBsyikA
Message From TWICE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZCe6eb6NSo
Message From ITZY: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LBV9OokUY5M
Message From Stray Kids: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6qBJb0ZU7jM

下一個挑戰係star性，即係魅力，星味，圈粉能力！以前Sixteen時都有，Sana表演煮嘢食！依個好似係JYP選秀中與眾不同嘅地方！所以Twice咁受歡迎嘅地方！

之前Sixteen仲有造型照，評判都揀Tzuyu，但JYP揀Jihyo！JYP真係可以看穿未來同可能性嘅製作人！獨具慧眼！減肥後嘅Jihyo真係好正，跳舞亦勁咗！當年真係唔明點解揀Dahyun ，但近年佢嘅魅力出現，baby fat走哂，仲靚咗，又玩得，綜藝擔當。Momo都係！其他評判覺得佢唱歌唔掂，但JYP覺得要跳舞機器，唱歌慢慢進步，而且佢儍勁十足，又可圈粉！Tzuyu亦係，JYP覺得佢努力有成長可能，而且網上投票都高，及後真係唱歌跳舞都進步，又成為「世一美」大美人，圈粉！

再下一個挑戰係人品，亦係JYP選秀特色，要謙虛，誠實，互相照顧，咁佢地出道唔會得罪前輩，愛護fans，團內和氣！Mina 舞台恐懼症，團員不離不棄，要齊齊整整嘅精神，依個就係團魂！所以JYP就係要搵善良性格嘅孩子！團隊先可以長久！

所以JYP女團就係平均，互補，唔想好似Miss A咁只紅Suzy！九人九色！

睇完ep9，覺得如果後期冇咩人有好突出表現既話，最終出道的應該是這些:
第一主唱: Nina 如果後期舞蹈冇改善，估計可能未必放佢出道，不過先14歲，jyp可能會收佢做練習生，畢竟唱歌天賦真係好勁，練埋韓語就真係日文韓文英文都掂，完全符合jyp想進攻國際既好人材
第二主唱:未光 其實如果新團係走日系可愛風，未光大概係center吧？
第三主唱:
領唱:
Rapper: rima 其實覺得佢天賦才能冇未光mako咁好，不過勝在長相大氣，感覺可以練多陣係韓國出道
領舞:
主舞，隊長: mako 隊長一定係走唔甩，ep9時jyp都講到明
門面:彩花 無咩技能，真係名符其實既長相打天下，不過睇落jyp真係幾鍾意佢

未知屬性:井上Akari ，小合麻由佳，大江梨久，摩耶，平井桃伽，Rio，池松里梨愛(減肥真係幾有毅力，相信jyp係有睇到，而且實力唔差)

估唔到: yuna 真係唔知應唔應該pick埋佢，始終佢係個兩年半既練習生，但睇上去同素人冇咩分別，d人話係佢緊張，但練習生時期showcase 都出席過不少啦仲緊張？有時睇佢d方塊全部都係追加既，都唔知係jyp覺得自家練習生點都要俾下面定點，目前真係比另外三位練習生要來得沒有太多特點，就睇第二季如果改變大既話jyp應該會俾佢出道

如果jyp係想複製出twice既成功，咁依個新團有可能會係9-11人左右既團，所以以上既人選基本上係我睇完ep1-9後根據評價和印象所選既

聽聞日本idol制度下，idol只係收月薪。如果JYP 引入韓國新制度，Nizi成員可分成演唱會、唱片、其他活動、廣告收入，咁一定顛覆日本樂壇制度！

因為Wonder Girl隊長閔先藝以前喺美國認識依家老公仲大埋肚，對整個圑好大影響，所以先有Twice三年禁愛令！日本女仔好易被人侵犯唔出聲，所以JYP一定要好好保護佢地！

人品好重要，JYP 選Twice定下要誠實、真實、謙虛。今次人品有9粒星，頭6名都有，然後Rio, Riria, Ayaka都有。Miss A 當年因中國成員Jia同大陸娛樂打龍通，唔續約，咁就解散，所以一定要睇人品！

Miss A只紅秀智，JYP怕Somi太紅，最後無加佢入ITZY,，Solo又暫時無新concept畀佢，所以導致Somi離開！所以Nizi成員一定要人品好，互相照顧，唔好爭風呷醋，咁先長久！

Miss A只紅秀智，JYP怕Somi太紅，最後無加佢入ITZY,，Solo又暫時無新concept畀佢，所以導致Somi離開！所以Nizi成員一定要人品好，互相照顧，唔好爭風呷醋，咁先長久！

日本娛樂界中有幾多綜藝節目？希望Nizi日後多上綜藝節目吸粉，發揮Star性。

其實你又知jyp係覺得somi太紅先冇放佢入itzy？其實itzy成員五人中有三個都有一定人氣基礎，就算somi有入都唔一定係最紅果個。而且jyp大概都睇得出somi冇咩solo潛質，可能就係因為somi自己唔想女團又想solo，所以出走先激嬲埋jyp。
不過的確因為依件事令jyp好睇重人品，其他都其次，人品行先。

ntv 4月17日開始逢周五深夜0：59播放「虹のかけ橋」，內容包括nizi part 1, 2既總集，並以唔同正篇既視點介紹各練習生。

// JYPエンターテインメントのオーディション番組「虹のかけ橋」が、日本テレビで放送される。

日本テレビは、4月17日から毎週金曜日0時59分、「Nizi Project」を追うオーディションバラエティ「虹のかけ橋」を放送する。

「虹のかけ橋」は、「Nizi Project」パート1＆2を網羅する総合番組。「Nizi Project」に参加した練習生たちの始まりからデビュー決定の瞬間までを収める。

特に今回の放送では、K-POPを代表するプロデューサーパク・ジニョンとピコ太郎のプロデューサー古坂大魔王が共に出演する。

パク・ジニョンは「『Nizi Project』を通じて日本でガールズグループをプロデュースすることができ、嬉しく思います。また『Nizi Project』が地上波で放送されると聞き、さらに嬉しいと思いました。『虹のかけ橋』はHuluで配信される番組とはまた違う視点で、練習生の紹介や新しいお知らせをお伝えできるので、多くの方に視聴していただきたいと願っております」と出演の心境を語った。 //
https://news.kstyle.com/m/article.ksn?articleNo=2140535

尋日朝早sukkiri nizi project特備環節，畀電視觀眾即時投票睇riku定maya既表演片段。

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z1r22YCZBnk
「Nizi Project」 スッキリ 2020年5月5日 Rima / Mayuka / Yuna

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2AJhnNZERs
Rough English translations as follows:

1:17 JYP: What I expect from you girls isn't whether you do well or poorly...
1:30 JYP: It's about how much you can grow as an artist, and I definitely see some unstable parts in your performance, because you chose a song & dance in a style you haven't picked before...
1:47 JYP: But, I think you'll be able to do well--fortunately, it seems like you understand the nuances (T/N: as in, feel of the song),
1:54 JYP: And what's even more important than even dancing or singing skills is "Star Power," and Rima, for the first time, I can finally "see you." (T/N: as in, Rima has finally managed to show off a bit of her individuality as a person/artist to JYP, instead of the copycat rapper swagger she was going for before that JYP criticized in Season 1)
2:11 JYP: Like, whoa--your expressions and vernacular (T/N: her unique speech pattern, y'know, like how one of your friends talks this way and another friend talks dat way?) have become so much more comfortable? Bright and easy and just like, like totally Rima-esque! (T/N: as in her own person and not trying be "somebody else")
2:20 JYP: It's really beautiful and pleasant to see.

2:26 JP Narrator/Box People: Rima finally starts to show herself/her personality; however, she does not receive a Super NIZI Triangle! I don't get it!/Ehh~?? No kyuu-bu?? (T/N: the talk show people keep calling it a cube, even though the housing is a cube and it's clearly a triangle, smh)

2:33 Rima: When JYP-san said "Today, Rima, you really seemed like yourself" I was really happy...
2:41 Rima: ...and when he said "You seem like a person who can make it," I felt so happy and relieved...
2:47 Rima: Happy cries* (T/N: Awwwww...)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=boy6r1RoO8A
Rough English translations as follows:

1:25 JYP: Uh... that was the BEST performance I could have hoped to expect from a contestant who's only trained for 1 month thus far. (T/N: Riku killed it)
1:35 JYP: To be honest, I wasn't expecting much.
1:39 JYP: Would she be able to convey that kind of arrogant, asshole/player-vibe in the dance routine?
1:43 JYP: Because there's definitely a difference between just performing a particular dance move and performing it while conveying the feeling/essence behind it.
1:50 JYP: What I'm saying is, Riku, you were able to convey that feeling/essence!
1:56 JYP: Everybody is growing at an incredible rate. (T/N: IMO, a general comment meant to praise Riku while not leaving the other girls out/making them feel better after their poor performances/negative critique from JYP, like a "there there")
2:02 RIKU GETS A SUPER NIZI TRIANGLE AWW YISS!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4syPv9A23V4
Rough English translations as follows:

1:45 JYP: Maya, do you know what my most frequent comment to you was, during your evaluations?
1:51 Maya: My movement is small... (T/N: she says it so timidly, it's kinda cute/sad)
1:54 JYP: Ah! No, I mean, positive comments! (sheepish huehehehehe)
1:59 JYP: "Acting Ability"
2:02 JYP: And wow, today too--because of your excellent acting ability (T/N: as in like stage presence), I can't see any of your other faults/lacking parts.
2:15 JYP: Maya, I think that is your best/true advantage.
2:26 MAYA GETS A SUPER NIZI TRIANGLE AWW YISS!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=csmAHsXsOJs
Rough English translations as follows:

1:24 Box Dude: Wow, wasn't that perfect?
1:28 JP Narrator: Nina sang wonderfully!
1:31 JP Narrator: However, JYP has a mysterious expression on his face... what will his critique be!?
1:39 JYP: It's incredible that you can sing like this for a 14-year old.
1:46 TEXT: HOWEVER!
1:48 JYP: Duh-dun~ duh-dun~ duh-dun~ dun~ duh-dun~ You could have been so much better with this kind of rhythm (T/N: like, feel the groove better and hit those beats sharp)
1:55 JYP: But you were like... na-na na-na na-na... not like that, but [JYP replicates the beat with flourish]
2:00 JYP: Y'know, like, a whole lot more... [T/N: as in, with feeling], I thought you were gonna sing like that, to be honest...
2:10 JP Narrator: JYP comments that Nina's performance lacks finesse...
2:14 JYP: I get that you can sing well, so don't try to show me your "vocal prowess," but instead try to sing with the goal of conveying the song's flavour, the song's feeling, the song's uniqueness--and I think that will help you a lot in the future.
2:33 JYP: I dunno if it's because I had high expectations of you, but I am slightly disappointed with your performance. I'll be looking forward to your next stage.
2:43 JP Narrator: Even Nina did not get a Super NIZI Triangle... because even if you perform well--without being able to demonstrate growth--you will not receive a Super NIZI Triangle during the Korea debut training camp!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zabzq4nC17c
Rough English translations as follows:

0:31 TEXT: YUNA's performance goes smoothly...
0:35 TEXT: BUT!
0:43 TEXT: Suddenly, Yuna's pitch becomes unstable!
1:08 JP Narrator: What will JYP's critique be?
1:11 JYP: Uh... do you why your singing came out so frustrating and unstable? (T/N: it's pretty much a rhetorical question)
1:20 Yuna: Probably... because my breathing was off... I think that's it.
1:28 JYP: To put it simply, hmm... you suddenly relaxed your lower abdomen, then put all your strength into your neck/vocal cords, which is why that annoying "eeee eeee" sound kept coming out,
1:37 JYP: And then because you weren't able to sing like you wanted to in your head, that also affected your dance, and it seemed like you were performing below your actual skill level.
1:44 TEXT: Nervousness/stage fright is holding Yuna back, yet again!
1:48 JYP: In fact, this performance was a disappointing display of your skills (T/N: like Yuna regressed)
1:54 JP Narrator: JYP's strict critique continues! Yuna is unable to obtain a Super NIZI Triangle...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ID03f7lqNRE
Rough English translations as follows:

1:11 JP Narrator: Ayaka safely completes her performance!
1:14 JP Narrator: What will JYP's critique be?
1:19 JYP: Remind me what the first move in the dance routine was?
1:23 TEXT: Ayaka freezes at JYP's sudden question
1:25 Ayaka repeats the dance movement*
1:38 JYP: When you did that, I was really surprised...
1:43 JYP: ...because a lot of your awkward movements from before were gone.
1:48 JYP: When I look at your performance today, your dancing & singing both improved again from your Tokyo training camp days!
1:56 JYP: I really think if you work really hard, you'll be able to do it/debut (T/N: could be taken either way how JYP said it)
2:07 JYP: In the eyes of a layperson/average joe, it may look like there isn't much difference, but in MY eyes, you definitely look like someone who's worked really hard this past month.
1:17 JP Narrator: Ayaka is praised for her effort and growth, but does not receive a Super NIZI Triangle...
1:23 JP Narrator: JYP's expectations are high indeed!

今集五個入面momo+被評hea同埋唔專業，加埋上面條片冇影同零鏡頭，應該收左皮。
Riria JYP 由頭到尾既意思都淨係叫佢減肥，今集仲隱隱見到雙下巴，再瘦唔到落黎都大獲。
Rima 整體ok但硬係捉到d缺點出黎，樣算靚但係五官望落又有少少奇怪，正常唱歌已經ok，但又要chok到把聲鬼唔馬六。
Mako 照舊，冇咩好講
Mayuka 最神奇，咁多個入面唔算好出色，但最有idol感覺既又係佢。其他人老實講好多都仲除唔甩路人既感覺。加埋呢算多鏡頭，估計後面應該會反cup

replies.msg:
JYP好注重人品，應該係佢咁多年總結女圑成功要素，以往韓國女團好多退圑同醜聞，無乜團可以好長久又無不和。JYP亦注重努力同進步，如果無嗰種態度，好易拖累全隊！Ayaka被評人品得分最高，而Momoka就最低！

Riria其實樣子甜美，但個大髀同肚肚仲有雙下巴，真係減得到會好上鏡好索！JYP 有對未來眼，Twice嘅Jihyo減完個樣，Dahyun無咗baby肥後個樣，都畀佢睇到出嚟！

Rima同Nina一定畀機會，佢哋外語能力，Rap同vocal，都係個團需要。Rima老竇係日本Rap名人堂，創出用日語Rap出節奏嘅竅門，作為日本女圑主要用日文，Rima有好重要嘅作用！

今次Mako應該排第一，Miihi仲係cutie，未有好似ITZY 嘅表現！Mako多方面表現都試過（但練習生showcase時已跳過哂Twice 啲cute 歌！

我都biased Mayuka，圑隊表現高於個人表現！

Twice嘅Nayeon好瞭解JYP ，講佢有個女人喺佢身體入邊！唔怪之得佢係女圑專家！

replies.msg:
JYP有講公司新策略
Localisation to internationalisation
先在本土打好基礎先打入國際
係佢以前Wonder Girls時犯下急進錯誤，將韓國市場讓畀少時，而當時美國金融危機，根本無乜發展，宣美頂唔住退出要讀書。
GOT7就國際勁過韓國！
依家Twice都係韓國打穩，再到日本，依家先去美國。
ITZY相信都係先打好韓國先。
Nizi應該係透過Sony Music打穩日本先，有可能會再去韓國，因為始終有知名度，再去國際。
Yuna起碼有半個韓國人血統，都算係自己人。
JYP未定團員數目，話唔定12人好似iz*one咁，喺日本可以大堆頭。以往JYP選秀都會撈返淘汰嘅參賽者⋯⋯Stray kids同Twice，所以話唔定。
講開又講，Sixteen 時無出道嘅都係00後出生，根本JYP 係愛才，如果佢哋能夠堅持到好似彩領咁都可以喺JYP 出道！Somi等唔切，其他都走出去選秀，好難控制！Somi，彩演，池原，Natty都相繼出道，Sixteen真係好勁！JYP 啲舞蹈教師都話跳舞實力最高就係Momo，彩演，請夏（以前都係JYP 練習生），Natty，真係可以出一隊ITZY。Natty最近出道，大個女咗，童顏巨乳，希望佢大發啦！
所以JYP 女練習生真係好很勁！
點解好似冇乜人鐘意riku

quote.msg:
JYP有講公司新策略
Localisation to internationalisation
先在本土打好基礎先打入國際
係佢以前Wonder Girls時犯下急進錯誤，將韓國市場讓畀少時，而當時美國金融危機，根本無乜發展，宣美頂唔住退出要讀書。
GOT7就國際勁過韓國！
依家Twice都係韓國打穩，再到日本，依家先去美國。
ITZY相信都係先打好韓國先。
Nizi應該係透過Sony Music打穩日本先，有可能會再去韓國，因為始終有知名度，再去國際。
Yuna起碼有半個韓國人血統，都算係自己人。
JYP未定團員數目，話唔定12人好似iz*one咁，喺日本可以大堆頭。以往JYP選秀都會撈返淘汰嘅參賽者⋯⋯Stray kids同Twice，所以話唔定。
講開又講，Sixteen 時無出道嘅都係00後出生，根本JYP 係愛才，如果佢哋能夠堅持到好似彩領咁都可以喺JYP 出道！Somi等唔切，其他都走出去選秀，好難控制！Somi，彩演，池原，Natty都相繼出道，Sixteen真係好勁！JYP 啲舞蹈教師都話跳舞實力最高就係Momo，彩演，請夏（以前都係JYP 練習生），Natty，真係可以出一隊ITZY。Natty最近出道，大個女咗，童顏巨乳，希望佢大發啦！
所以JYP 女練習生真係好很勁！
都希望natty可以大發，起碼做到請夏咁已經好好。但其實又未必得，始終韓國排外都好勁下，而佢又solo唔係團體出道，又唔似somi係混血(雖然我覺得somi係sixteen,produce101既加成下solo成績唔算好)，以一個外國人身份係韓國solo出道，佢真係要用比其他人多好多成努力先得
起碼做到請夏咁已經係太高標準。

Rough English translations in progress:

1:42 JYP: Miss Akari...
1:45 JYP: When I first met you, I thought to myself, "Wow, I've found someone worthy who I really want to produce for and mentor!"
1:58 JYP: And because I had such high expectations for you in my mind, I kept getting disappointed again and again... until you hit rock bottom and ranked in 13th place.
2:09 JYP: It was a really frustrating and sad experience. I thought, "Ah, did I make a mistake?"
2:21 JYP: But today, Miss Akari, you did so well that you stood out to me the most.
2:36 Akari: Thank you very much...!
2:43 JYP: What stood out in particular was your dancing.
2:47 JYP: It really felt like a shining star (T/N: pretty sure JYP means star as in celebrity, but this descriptions works in a figurative sense, too) was dancing around on stage...
2:55 JYP: ...and I was happy to know that "Ah, I didn't make a mistake."
3:03 Akari: Thank you very much...!
3:10 JYP: Miss Riria, uh, because you kept falling short of my expectations during your previous performances, you haven't had a single chance to be praised by me, right? Except that one time near the beginning of this whole show, correct?
3:19 Riria: Yes.
3:21 JYP: Well, you've improved greatly today.
3:25 Riria: Thank you very much...!

replies.msg: 靚，係咪開咗濾鏡？

今次個團體對決真係有d唔公平，真係完全睇得出jyp係好想彩花出道。其實真係公平咁講，兩隊都差唔多，但係未光組就真係勝在三個都係jyp心目中人選。
未光繼續老本行可愛感重，但就咁睇冇nobody時咁令人驚艷，反而其實老厭厭地佢既可愛風格(雖然係真係好可愛)，彩花就舞蹈明顯進步左，但把聲真係唔多頂得順。最驚喜係rima，少左一股懶cool感，可愛既rap感覺又唔係好差，比之前真係好左好多。
其實相比起nina組，其實依組要展示出黎既應該要更加多d，起碼係會令人想要一再回味，始終依組係兩個練習生加一素人 對 另一組四個素人，所以當我就咁睇落去冇一組話特別出彩，亦冇一組係特別出錯時，我反而會覺得jyp真係偏心未光組到出面。不過其實依個分組都預左既，jyp應該最想係彩花出道，然後考驗下之後兩組中riku組既riku能不能夠帶領組裡面兩個唔係好掂（一個緊張到冇自信，一個得過且過）既人吧，就咁睇都唔知話jyp對riku太有自信定唔太鍾意佢。不過如果佢成功帶令隊拎到cube，估計jyp同觀眾對佢既睇法立刻就會上升，但對手係mako就真係難左d

其實相比起nina組，其實依組要展示出黎既應該要更加多d，起碼係會令人想要一再回味，始終依組係兩個練習生加一素人 對 另一組四個素人，所以當我就咁睇落去冇一組話特別出彩，亦冇一組係特別出錯時，我反而會覺得jyp真係偏心未光組到出面。不過其實依個分組都預左既，jyp應該最想係彩花出道，然後考驗下之後兩組中riku組既riku能不能夠帶領組裡面兩個唔係好掂（一個緊張到冇自信，一個得過且過）既人吧，就咁睇都唔知話jyp對riku太有自信定唔太鍾意佢。不過如果佢成功帶令隊拎到cube，估計jyp同觀眾對佢既睇法立刻就會上升，但對手係mako就真係難左d

講經咩
首歌係可愛風格 咁緊係行返老本行 可愛架啦

replies.msg: 我夠知首歌可愛啦我只係想表達食返老本行未光好難會輸(雖然其他風格佢都大概率贏)，但我比較想下次jyp可以俾首唔同風格既歌俾佢有多d挑戰性，次次都可愛真係會厭，我諗未光自己都想突破所以上次先揀首nobody黎唱。而好似今次rima就真係唔同風格，睇落有驚喜

replies.msg:
Rough English translations as follows:

2:04 JYP: You know, you guys are technically still in training--whose debut isn't even confirmed yet--and I totally forgot all that while watching you girls perform.
2:19 JYP: When the 3 of you were dancing--the angle of your arms, the speed of your movements, posture... everything... it's like the 3 of you were dancing as "One." (T/N: as in, the girls were completely in sync and seemed like one single unit or "person")
2:32 JYP: I felt, "Oh boy, this is gonna be good--they're gonna kick ass..."
2:37 JYP: ...right when y'all two--Maya and Rio--put on your jackets near the beginning of the performance, and you guys were doing it almost simultaneously!
2:46 JYP: Miss Rio--although all 3 of you did very well, the expressiveness of your voice stood out to me the most.
3:15 JYP: Even though you were performing such an exerting dance routine, you managed to continue breathing using your lower abdomen (T/N: breathing using your stomach, instead of your mouth/throat--this is how babies breathe and how we all first learn to breathe when born), and that helped your vocals remain vibrant and your pitch remain steady while singing.
3:34 JYP: Honestly speaking... what surprised me the most about this performance, to be honest... was how fast and energetic you were, Miss Maya!
3:45 Maya: I received power (T/N: as in, "energy" or "good vibes") from these two, and so my own power became brighter, and how my expression (T/N: her facial expressions, 'cause Maya kinda has that gloomy look/vibe, or to put it another way for English-speakers, RBF syndrome--no offense intended) became more and more cheerful is really thanks to these two.
3:57 JYP: Long story short--the only way a performance like this is possible is if the three of you get along well with each other, and practice hard together as one unit...
4:04 JYP: ...and for all that to happen smoothly, the Leader's got to do a really good job, and that makes me think that you--Mako--must have been an excellent Leader... good job.

replies.msg:
Rough English translations as follows:

1:35 JYP: After watching this team's performance... I feel very conflicted, and--
1:43 JYP: I feel very happy and glad--and at the same time, I feel very disappointed and frustrated.
1:52 JYP: The happiness I feel is all thanks to Miss Riku.
2:03 JYP: I keep getting pleasantly surprised by your continuous evolution.
2:10 JYP: Last time when you performed "Who's Your Mama?", I was so surprised how a person who gives off the aura of a "good girl" could express the "douche-y" vibe of a "player" so well!
2:21 JYP: That shook me. I was like, "Whoa, Riku can do that?!"
2:26 JYP: And today--I didn't expect you could also be so feminine with your dance/movements!
2:35 JYP: All your movements were so precise, and nimble, and powerful...
2:42 Riku: Thankyouverymuch~
2:55 JYP: Miss Momoka, your voice is inaudible because it's getting drowned out by the music (T/N: JYP can't clearly hear Momoka's voice over the backing track), and even when you dance, it's not with the intention of performing, but rather, with the apprehension of a student taking an exam.
3:08 JYP: Yuna, you've been practicing at JYP Entertainment for 3+ years... yet, Riku danced this JYP Entertainment group's song much better than you. 睇完swing baby同heart shaker，真係分別唔係一般既大
今次maya真係好好，好有自信，聲同舞都做得好，當然隊友配合都係一大原因
Mako都好好，但對比返佢之前既表演，可能之前太好了所以難以突破到，比起maya少左d令人耳目一新既感覺
Rio都好好，唔會話因為有mako同maya而令自己失色，感覺佢個排名真係低左d，今次唱歌真係好左既
成隊感覺好似出左道咁，三個都配合得好好，唔會話有個太突出有個又太拖油瓶既感覺

Heart shaker組既表演真係預料到，一開始期待過riku會唔會帶起到另兩個，但實情起唔得既
首歌一開始就俾我一種唔知佢地做緊乜既感覺，好似每個音都唔準咁，而舞雖然都齊但就總有一種無氣無力既feel。
係依種情況下riku得到第四都真係好勁，而首歌又的確去到高音位我先覺得首歌正常返，感覺就係riku帶唔起兩位，反而感覺俾兩位埋沒左咁。
其實以素人黎講成首歌都冇咩出錯，但係前面三組表演都好好之餘隊裡面仲有個yuna，真係令人一言難盡。yuna我估計應該心態都開始崩了吧？好似同momoka一樣都冇股好想出道既心一樣，上次akari得最尾個樣真係唔一樣。
不過當然都係我估估下姐，不過睇落jyp都開始放棄yuna了吧？

睇完最新，淨番幾集局勢都開始明朗。13個人大致分為三組

1. 出硬道6個
JYP 三人組, 苦瓜面+路人樣（個人真係麻麻地）被讚到上天，應該都冇乜懸念。加埋個四五（四肢疆硬五音不全）咁既實力都被jyp硬推佢上第七。出道實冇問題。
啦。

2. 大機會4個
長期病患者衰過一次，要睇埋下次先肯定。高音同dancer有屬性加持，都大機會。最後加埋個丸子頭，笑容十分、實力應該都有4、5分，本來應該排佢落第三組，不過發現呢幾集佢份量出奇地多，應該有d境滾。

3危危乎3個
雙下巴同韓妹都有個肥既弱點，出道接近無望。唯一反勝既機會就係下round大爆seed，睇下jyp肯唔肯為佢地撐大個group既size去到11、12人，唔係都唔夠上面4個鬥。
最後失踪人士唔鏡頭份量失蹤，過一兩集應該連個人都失埋蹤。

雙下巴同韓妹都有個肥既弱點，出道接近無望。唯一反勝既機會就係下round大爆seed，睇下jyp肯唔肯為佢地撐大個group既size去到11、12人，唔係都唔夠上面4個鬥。
最後失踪人士唔鏡頭份量失蹤，過一兩集應該連個人都失埋蹤。

好似睇緊20年前既師奶八卦雜誌
清係咪覺得咁樣講野好有趣

Rough English translations as follows:

2:31 JYP: Of the 13 remaining contestants, there was one in particular who I felt the most concerned about...
2:45 JYP: Because her time as a JYP Trainee was the longest, I feel as if she felt the burden to be the best.
2:53 JYP: And that burden turned into a source of great stress, which caused a series of unfortunate & bad outcomes...
3:10 JYP: As the song began, I noticed right away that your dancing was different from before!
3:21 JYP: Such a big/powerful sound came from you! (T/N: the reason why JYP was talking about her dancing then suddenly talks about Yuna's singing is because they edited it that way)
3:34 JYP: I can imagine just how incredibly stressed & sad you've been feeling, so I was shook--in fact, I almost cried!

2:08 JYP: Uh, Mako--you're so friggin' cool! It's pretty much impossible to find any faults with you, so there's really nothing to evaluate.
